[Groovy] Class FilteredReader

  java.io.Reader
      java.io.BufferedReader
          com.github.jlgrock.closuretoolslibrary.utils.io.readers.FilteredReader

class FilteredReader
extends java.io.BufferedReader

A reader for parsing through a stream and replacing one thing with another.

Property Summary

The default buffer if none is provided.

The string to replace.
